metadata.title: CVE-2024-2609 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The permission prompt input delay could have expired while the window isnot in focus, which made the prompt vulnerable to clickjacking by maliciouswebsites. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 124.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
